languages.text: Each time the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text: 装备者每{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}一次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}就会提高{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}%，效果持续至下{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 装备者每闪避一次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}，暴击率就会提高<u>（5+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}{/g}效果持续至下{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可叠加。
装备者每{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}一次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，暴击率就会提高{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}%，效果持续至下{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: При каждом {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атаки в ближнем бою{/g} персонаж получает +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического попадания{/g} до конца своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: При каждом уклонении от {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаки в ближнем бою{/g} персонаж получает +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического попадания{/g} до конца своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

При каждом уклонении от {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаки в ближнем бою{/g} персонаж получает +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического попадания{/g} до конца своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

При каждом {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атаки в ближнем бою{/g} персонаж получает +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического попадания{/g} до конца своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}するたびに、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット率{/g}が+{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}%上昇する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}を回避するたびに、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット確率{/g}が<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>％上昇する。この効果はスタックする。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}するたびに、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}が{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}%上昇する。スタックする。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, obtiene +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico hasta finalizar su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador esquiva un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, obtiene +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico hasta finalizar su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, obtiene +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico hasta finalizar su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, erhält er bis zum Ende seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e} % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Jedes mal, wenn der Träger einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} ausweicht, erhält er +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} bis zum Ende seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g}. Addiert sich.

Jedes mal, wenn der Träger einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, erhält er +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e} % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} bis zum Ende seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}. Addiert sich.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, il bénéficie de +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur esquive une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g}, il bénéficie de +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cumulable.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur esquive une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g}, il bénéficie de +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cumulable.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, il bénéficie de +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cumulable.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısından{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçındığında{/g} +%{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e} kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Etki, bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
